amendment.description: To require the placement of blast-resistant cargo containers on all commercial passenger aircraft.

action.text: Amendment SA 4995 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Amendment SA 4995 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9605-9606; text: CR S9605) To require the placement of blast-resistant cargo containers on all commercial passenger aircraft.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4995 proposed by Senator Boxer.
